content: other markers round 1 *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to end knit 4 4 4 6 6 6 6 rnds round 2 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end these 2 rnds set rib work in rib for 3cm 6 short row for neck shaping for all sizes row 1 rs k15 20 24 26 25 33 32 w&t place yoke pattern row 2 ws p30 40 48 52 50 66 64 w&t change to 3 75mm circular needle and working row 3 rs knit to last rs wrapped st knit from chart or written instructions for your size next st with its wrap k7 more sts wrap next proceed as follows st and turn next round patt 14 14 14 14 16 16 16 sts as set row 4 ws purl to last ws wrapped st purl on round 1 for lace pattern for your size next st with its wrap p7 more sts wrap next 20 22 24 26 25 26 28 times st and turn working decreases as given work next repeat row 3 and 4 another 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 times 29 29 33 33 33 33 33 rnds as set for lace pattern for your size next row rs knit to last rs wrapped st knit 120 132 144 156 150 156 168 sts next st with its wrap k7 7 7 8 8 8 8 more sts wrap next st and turn next row ws purl to last ws wrapped st purl for 1st 2nd 4th 5th and 7th sizes only next st with its wrap p7 7 7 8 8 8 8 more sts next round k2tog k58 20 11 23 10 2 6 12 6 14 wrap next st and turn times 118 126 144 144 154 sts next row rs partial knit to beg of round marker resume working in the round for 3rd size only next round knit to end of round next round k2tog k12 k2tog k12 k2tog k13 work 4 6 6 7 10 13 14 rnds 4 times k2tog k12 134 sts for 1st size only for 6th size only next round knit next round k2tog k17 k2tog k18 4 times 148 sts for 2nd size only for all sizes next round k2tog k37 k2tog k38 4 times 308 sts change to 3 25mm circular needle and work 3cm in rib as set on hem cast off in rib for 3rd and 5th sizes only next round k2tog k 83 49 4 8 times 336 400 sts making up for 4th size only using kitchener stitch join underarm stitches next round k2tog k29 k2tog k30 k2tog k29 pin your garment out to measurements cover 5 times k2tog k28 364 sts with a damp cloth and leave to dry for 6th size only next round * k2tog k19 k2tog k20 8 times k2tog k19 repeat from * once more 416 sts for 7th size only next round k2tog k37 twice k2tog k36 8 times k2tog
